Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> have we <S%H6684>fasted,<s%> say they, and thou <S%H7200>seest<s%> <S%H3808>not?<s%> wherefore have we <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> our <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and thou takest no <S%H3045>knowledge?<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H6685>fast<s%> ye <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2656>pleasure,<s%> and <S%H5065>exact<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6092>labors.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> ye <S%H6684>fast<s%> for <S%H7379>strife<s%> and <S%H4683>debate,<s%> and to <S%H5221>smite<s%> with the <S%H106>fist<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness:<s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6684>fast<s%> as ye do this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to make your <S%H6963>voice<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> on <S%H4791>high.<s%>

Is <S%H1961><s%> it <S%H2088>such<s%> a <S%H6685>fast<s%> that I have <S%H977>chosen?<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> for a <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> his <S%H5315>soul?<s%> is it to bow <S%H3721>down<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> as a <S%H100>bulrush,<s%> and to <S%H3331>spread<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> and <S%H665>ashes<s%> under him? wilt thou <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> a <S%H6685>fast,<s%> and an <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>

Is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> the <S%H6685>fast<s%> that I have <S%H977>chosen?<s%> to <S%H6605>loose<s%> the <S%H2784>bands<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> to <S%H5425>undo<s%> the <S%H4133>heavy<s%> <S%H92>burdens,<s%> and to let the <S%H7533>oppressed<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free,<s%> and that ye <S%H5423>break<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4133>yoke?<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> shall thy <S%H216>light<s%> break <S%H1234>forth<s%> as the <S%H7837>morning,<s%> and thine <S%H724>health<s%> shall spring <S%H6779>forth<s%> <S%H4120>speedily:<s%> and thy <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be thy <S%H622>rearward.<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> shalt thou <S%H7121>call,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6030>answer;<s%> thou shalt <S%H7768>cry,<s%> and he shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2009>Here<s%> I am. <S%H518>If<s%> thou take <S%H5493>away<s%> from the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of thee the <S%H4133>yoke,<s%> the putting <S%H7971>forth<s%> of the <S%H676>finger,<s%> and <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H205>vanity;<s%>

And if thou draw <S%H6329>out<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> to the <S%H7457>hungry,<s%> and <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> the <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> <S%H5315>soul;<s%> then shall thy <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H2224>rise<s%> in <S%H2822>obscurity,<s%> and thy <S%H653>darkness<s%> be as the noonday: <S%H6672><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5148>guide<s%> thee <S%H8548>continually,<s%> and <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> in <S%H6710>drought,<s%> and make <S%H2502>fat<s%> thy <S%H6106>bones:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> like a <S%H7302>watered<s%> <S%H1588>garden,<s%> and like a <S%H4161>spring<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3576>fail<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And they that shall be <S%H4480>of<s%> thee shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H5769>old<s%> waste <S%H2723>places:<s%> thou shalt raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of many <S%H1755>generations;<s%> <S%H1755><s%> and thou shalt be <S%H7121>called,<s%> The <S%H1443>repairer<s%> of the <S%H6556>breach,<s%> The <S%H7725>restorer<s%> of <S%H5410>paths<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in.

If <S%H518><s%> thou turn <S%H7725>away<s%> thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> from the <S%H4480>sabbath,<s%> <S%H7676><s%> from <S%H6213>doing<s%> thy <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> on my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> and <S%H7121>call<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> a <S%H6027>delight,<s%> the <S%H6918>holy<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3513>honorable;<s%> and shalt <S%H3513>honor<s%> him, not <S%H4480>doing<s%> <S%H6213><s%> thine own <S%H1870>ways,<s%> nor <S%H4480>finding<s%> <S%H4672><s%> thine own <S%H2656>pleasure,<s%> nor <S%H1696>speaking<s%> thine own words: <S%H1697><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> shalt thou delight <S%H6026>thyself<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and I will cause thee to <S%H7392>ride<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H398>feed<s%> thee with the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> thy <S%H1>father:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.
